model.name: inputType
model.title: Input Type
model.description: Set the expected data type of the input message. If the actual message type is different at runtime camel look for a required Transformer and apply if exists. If validate attribute is true then camel applies Validator as well.
model.label: configuration

validate.description: Set if validation is required for this input type.

id.description: Sets the id of this node

description.description: Sets the description of this node
